text:
Salman says he is a fan of SRK

Bollywood superstar Salman Khan says he is a fan of his friend and contemporary Shah Rukh Khan. The 50-year-old actor made the revelation on Twitter while sharing the trailer of SRK’s much-awaited film Fan . “@beingsalmankhan being a fan of @iamsrk,” Salman wrote. This is not the first time the Bajrangi Bhaijaan star has promoted Shah Rukh’s film. Before the release of “Diwale,” Salman posted a series of promtional tweets and Dubsmash videos. Returning the favour, the “Chennai Express” actor also made videos on “Prem Ratan Dhan Payo” title track. — PTI
title: ENT-SALMAN
